thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com
thread.title: Robert

author: Robert
title: Robert
text: I am blown away by Ssense's inventory and line curation. I found their detailed sizing information for each piece they sold to be an amazing data point that helped me feel more confident in my high value online purchases. Their shipping was very fast, returns were easy, and their prices ranged from competitive to a steal on some very specific items. I will definitely shop with them again...and again...and again.
